description:
Rin loves speed more than anything.  When she awakens as a Planetary Gear, she challenges Daichi to a battle in the Ningyohime.  He succeeds in destroying her libido capsule, but allows the Abreaction to occur at the last second.  Teppei, who`d been upset at not being able to contribute to the team, decides to go to space in Daichi`s place.
Source: crunchyroll
